import './AddProject.css' import { useState } from 'react' import { ReactComponent as AddIcon } from '../assets/add.svg' import { createProject } from './../ApiCaller.js' const AddProject = ({refresh}) => { const [project, setProject] = useState(""); const handleSubmit = (event) => { event.preventDefault(); alert(`The name you entered was: ${project}`) createProject(project) setProject("") refresh() } return (
setProject(e.target.value.replace(/\s/g, ''))}>
) } export default AddProject
